item.title: Welcome to the Zero Sum Era. Now How Do We Get Out?
item.description: Zero-sum thinking has spread like a mind virus, from geopolitics to pop culture.

item.title: Gazans Mark a Somber Ramadan Amid the Rubble
item.description: “This Ramadan is nothing like the ones before,” said one resident as the holy fasting month for Muslims began. “The war has drained it of meaning.”
